support.title: SUPPORT US!
support.subtitle: ioBroker is free – and it should stay that way!
support.description: But servers, development and maintenance need power (and sometimes coffee). If you like our project, we appreciate your support!
support.paypal.text: Whether a small amount or a big boost – every donation goes directly into the further development of ioBroker.
support.amazon.text: Ordering from Amazon anyway? Use our link! A small percentage of your purchase goes to ioBroker – you don’t pay a cent more!
support.footer: PS: Your donation won’t be wasted on luxury smart home gadgets – promised!
